c:complexType.name: ChartTitlePanelOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the CCC title panel.
The default
is 'top'.
The default
is '14px sans-serif'.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points provided by the chart title panel.

c:complexType.name: ChartTitlePanelExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the chart title panel.
To use an extension point you must find its full name: join the prefix property name, like , with one of the properties of the type of the extension point, like , with an "_" character in between, and obtain the name title_fillStyle.

c:property.name: title
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the top panel of the title panel of the root chart.

c:property.name: titleLabel
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the label that holds the title text itself, when the title panel belongs to the root chart.

c:property.name: smallTitle
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the main panel of a small chart.

c:property.name: smallTitleLabel
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the label that holds the title text itself, when the title panel belongs to a small chart.
